description:
There was a huge typhoon coming which would bring extremely strong winds. According to the weather report, it is expected to hit the Kanto region. So everyone at Fushin Newspaper began to prepare for this typhoon by tying up the bikes so they wouldn`t fly away and bringing buckets into the house. In the evening, Saki seemed to be getting better and suggested that everyone go to the bathhouse. Despite the strong winds, Mika showed up and went with the gang to the bathhouse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My First Time at the Bath with Everyone
はじめての, みんなでお風呂
